title: David J. Silbey, “The Boxer Rebellion and the Great Game in China” (Hill and Wang, 2012)
description:
Historian David Silbey returns to New Books in Military History with his second book, The Boxer Rebellion and the Great Game in China (Hill and Wang, 2012). The popular uprising known as the Boxer Rebellion has long only been vaguely understood, with Hollywood playing as great a role in shaping...
